alert.note: Alert for Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 10 at 11:40AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River At Ashton affecting Spink County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Stratford affecting Spink and Brown Counties. James River At Columbia affecting Brown County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River At Ashton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding begins to affect some crop land along with moderate flooding of pasture and low-lying areas * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:45 AM CDT Wednesday was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 13.3 feet. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Sunday evening by 645 PM CDT.
